chat.msg: Welcome!

assuming, x is where you start, you head south west from the map. you are going to go across the south western part of tiger island until you hit ocean. then you will go slightly west, northwesternish and make your way around the bird on the elephant bird island. you will navigate around the bird, making a crescent "c" shape until you hit the rocks leading to the frog island. at frog island you will head south east going halfway into the island and going west toward the ocean where you will ride a crocodile to the southern tip of the elephant bird island.

I start at the starting point (x) and head south-west towards the tiger island. As I reach the island, I see the tiger sitting on the small island. Continuing based on your instructions, I go slightly west and north-westernish, making my way around the bird on the elephant bird island. 

I navigate around the bird, making a crescent "C" shape until I hit the rocks leading to the frog island. At the frog island, I head south-east, going halfway into the island. From there, I go west toward the ocean and find a crocodile waiting for me. I ride the crocodile to the southern tip of the elephant bird island.

I have followed your instructions so far, what's the next step to reach the treasure?
next you will navigate across the elephant bird island until you get to the rocks leading west toward the giraffe island.

Thank you for the direction. I make my way across the elephant bird island, keeping an eye out for any obstacles or landmarks. As I reach the edge of the island, I spot the rocks that lead west toward the giraffe island. 

Now I have arrived at the rocks. What should be my next move to continue on the correct path toward the treasure?
navigating slight south east, you will find a land bridge that takes you to snake island where you navigate east toward the treasure.

Got it! I navigate south-east from the rocks and soon come across a land bridge that takes me to snake island. As I step onto the island, I see a snake slithering nearby. 

Following your instructions, I head east, keeping an eye out for any signs or landmarks that could lead me closer to the treasure.

As I continue east, I eagerly await your next set of instructions to guide me to the treasure.

chat.msg: Welcome!
start at the dog. you will go south on a tree bridge across a river to other part of the land.
Great! You're starting at the white dog. Now, let's head west, below a wooden bench. Can you describe what you see along the way?
you will go west toward a trail that take you to a table that has flowers and cats in boxes.
Not quite! Let's take a step back. From the white dog, we need to go left (west) and pass below a wooden bench. Can you tell me what you see next?
a trail
That's correct! Now, cross the trail and make a left turn. What do you see now?
a table with flowers and cats in boxes
Actually, we need to make a u-turn and cross the trail again, going back towards the white dog. So, what do you see now?
the wooden bench
That's right! Now, let's move on to the next step. We're going to cross a wooden branch that's crossing a river. Can you describe the scene as you cross the branch?
its a dark wooden tree bridge crossing the river to the other land mass
You're doing great! Now, continue heading south on the other side of the bridge. What do you see as you go south?
theres some bushes. further in the bushes is a picnic basket with a dog.
Almost there! Rather than going towards the picnic, we want to pass by it and just touch a bowl of berries on a mat. After that, which direction should we head?
touching the berries on the mat we go back west to a brown tree bridge to cross back to the other land mass
Not quite. After touching the bowl of berries on the mat, we need to continue in the same direction. Keep going west. What do you encounter next?
a bridge
That's right! We're making progress. After the bridge, you should see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Can you spot them?
yes i see them
Perfect! Now, let's move on. We're going to go south, just a few steps, between the old people and another wooden branch. What can you see as you move south?
a deer
Not yet! We need to go a few steps south, between the old people and the wooden branch. Take a closer look, what do you see after moving south?
bushes
Great job! Now, let's continue. We're going to go east, between the wooden branch and the bushes. Can you visualize the path we need to take?
not quite
I apologize for the confusion. Let me clarify. From where you are, go a few steps to the east, between the wooden branch and the bushes. What do you see now?
the two people
No worries! Let's make it clearer. After going east, you should see a brown young deer. Can you spot it?
yes i see the deer
Awesome! That's our final objective. You did a great job following the path. Well done!
thank you!
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to guide you. If you ever want to explore the map again or need help with anything else, feel free to ask. Enjoy your day!

chat.msg: Welcome!
you are going to start at the tent
Got it. I am currently at the tent. What should I do next?
head south passing two bushes.
Great! I am heading south from the tent and passing two bushes. I am now at the dog sitting to the south of the bushes. What's next?
you are going to go further south till you see a trail.
Understood! I am continuing south from the dog, and now I see a trail ahead. What do I do next after reaching the trail?
take a left heading east on the trail heading north when you see a fire in the distance
Got it! I have taken a left on the trail and I am now heading east. As I continue on the trail, I see a fire in the distance. Should I keep heading north towards the fire?
head north above the fire to avoid it. stops hen you see a bush.
Alright, I am continuing north, above the fire, to avoid it. As I keep going, I have now encountered a bush. What should I do next?
head toward the trail passing mushrooms on your left side.
I understand. I am now heading towards the trail, passing some mushrooms on my left side. I will continue along the trail. What should I do after passing the mushrooms?
head toward a blue car but then go back on the trail going around a big bush near the front of the car to the other side of the trail

Got it! I am heading towards the blue car and then going back on the trail, going around a big bush near the front of the car to the other side of the trail. I am now on the other side of the trail. What's next?
head south passing a bush on your right and another bush one your left. at this point you should see a telescope near a bush.
Okay, I am now heading south, passing a bush on my right and another bush on my left. As I continue, I see a telescope near a bush. What do I do next?
go between the bush and telescope to the other side of the trail, this is a shortcut!
Oh, a shortcut! I will make my way between the bush and the telescope to the other side of the trail. Thank you for pointing out the shortcut. What should I do now?
head east on the trail until you see rocks on your right side.
Got it! I am now heading east on the trail. As I continue, I notice rocks on my right side. What should I do next?
using the rocks as a guide, walk with them until you see a brown house in the distance.
Okay, I am using the rocks as a guide and walking alongside them. I will continue until I see a brown house in the distance. What's next after I reach the brown house?
climb up the rocks and go ahead and make your way into the brown house aka your destination

Perfect! I am climbing up the rocks and making my way towards the brown house. I will proceed inside the house, which is my destination. 

*finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi im at the palm tree, where do i go next
Great! From the palm tree, go under the tree towards the south-west. Once you're past the tree, turn right and walk past the second palm tree. Let me know when you've done that!
heading south west past the second palm tree, i see a dog south. what do i do next?
Excellent! Now, instead of going towards the dog, make a sharp left turn before the third palm tree and continue walking towards the south. Let me know when you've completed this step!
ive made my way passed the third palm tree and heading south toward two rocks.
Great job! Now, as you approach the rocks, go slightly to the left of the brown puppy. Then, make a right turn and head towards the south. Let me know when you've reached the water!
ive crossed the rocks and puppy and im at the water. what do i do next?
Fantastic progress! Now, enter the water and face the large red crab. After that, make a right turn and start going along the big rock, continuing westward in the water. Keep me posted!
passing the crab and the large rock and the smaller rock. i see a shark and a ball. what do i do next?

Great job navigating through the water! Now, when you see the shark, make a sharp turn to the right. After that, return back to the land, but this time make sure to go in between the medium rock and the blue-yellow-white ball. Keep moving northward and let me know when you've done that!
i have navigated pass the ball and rock. i see a speaker in the distance.

Excellent progress! Now, veer slightly to the left and head towards the northwest, making sure to cross between the red tent on your left and the larger speaker on your right. Keep going and let me know when you've made it through!
ive passed the tent and speaker, do i keep going north toward the edge of the land?

Almost there! Instead of going directly north, circle around the tent in an arc and then continue heading south towards the sea. But don't reach the water just yet! Once you're at the shore, make a right turn (west) and go below the red kayak. Let me know once you've done that!
gotcha. ive done my arc and im below the kayak. where next

Great job navigating around the tent and reaching the kayak! Now, make a 90-degree turn to the right (north) and follow along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. That's your final objective! Let me know once you've reached the green bush!
ive made my 90 degree turn along the kayak and im at the bush. what next?

Congratulations! You have successfully reached your final objective, the small green bush. Well done! I hope you enjoyed the journey. Feel free to explore the map or let me know if you'd like to play again.
thank you!
You're welcome! It was a pleasure guiding you through the map. If you have any more questions or need assistance with anything else, feel free to ask. Have a great day!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
